name: Mech A Break For It
description:
Control:

Player 1:

A:move left | D:move right | S:switch-limb

Player 2:

Left Arrow:move left | Right Arrow:move right | Down Arrow:switch-limb

Interaction:

Touch yellow triangle to get speed buff, red triangle for jump buff, red button for elevator

By Ruochen Zhuang, Eric Eaglesham, Stone Zhang, and Wenhao Zhu
